mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_table(title, userName, boardPass, content, fileAttached) VALUES (#{title}, #{userName}, #{boardPass}, #{content}, #{fileAttached})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, userName, boardHits, date_format(createdAt, "%Y-%m-%d") as createdAt FROM board_table order by id desc
mapper.update: UPDATE board_table set boardHits = boardHits + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) VALUES (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
